TopicTitle: Convert Random Letters to a Sentence!

Articles.Content:
"Silence, human!" Unbuntu ignited, wickedly attacking cold-killers.

pkpechang

Pick ka pow even chose angle nonagon gophers.

ahuhtjne

> 
> Old anus just fart water Austin.
> YJGS (rep points to who correctly guesses this one)

your jars got slimy? idk

ATTENTION HUMANS: Undead heroes took Japan. Now embrace!

yergbd

"Yer entire rum, gone." - Blackbeard, disgusted.

auvrkep

After university, Vader rented Kerbin's evilest pad.

lcmdbe

Like chocolate, meat doubles beta electrolytes

(don't take diet advice from this thread)

xyfzqlua

Xenodochial, yellow frozen zebras quizzing little, Ukranian aardvarks.

isdiaicdt (points to who gets this)

Increasing spore diversity is absolutely important, considering dynamic temperatures.

rfhjwej

Ruby falcons just won't win English jerseys.

iascnmx

"I am Super-Cat!" "Nice monster, Xanthar!"

hdkfur

Hide dead kittens for unknown reasons 

qwereeq

Quietly, we envisioned Raichu eating eggs. Quietly.

bencihb

Battling entire nations, Carlos intelligently hired bodyguards.

pebtkeby

Prehistoric enzymes became toxic, killing every baby yobbo.

hgedcyu

Handsome George, entrepreneur deluxe. Careless, yet unbeatable.

tnewlfta

Teenage Nuclear-Energized Waffles! Live free, then ascend!

yebuc

Yet Eric, being unctuous, cried.

jnefwe

Justice never existed, for we existed.

gdhulrc

Greg died here, under ludicrously repetitive cactus.

pncydb

Pretty nasty choices, Yvette didn't bother.

oegfvfki

Only eggs grant free vases for killer iPhones.

ecgyubjf

Ethanol calls guns youth back jack found

E4snf
